abstract: Details of former Israeli Prime Min Ariel Sharon’s health and status have been closely guarded by his family since his stroke in 2005, but his son Gilad is discussing the matter as he prepares to publicize biography of his father titled Sharon: The Life of a Leader.
snippet: Details of Ariel Sharon’s health and status have been closely guarded by the family, but his son, Gilad, agreed to discuss the matter as he prepares to publicize a biography of his father.
lead_paragraph: Details of Ariel Sharon’s health and status have been closely guarded by the family, but his son, Gilad, agreed to discuss the matter as he prepares to publicize a biography of his father.

headline.main: Six Years After a Debilitating Stroke, Sharon Remains Responsive, His Son Says
headline.print_headline: Six Years After a Debilitating Stroke, Sharon Remains Responsive, His Son Says
headline.seo: 6 Years After Stroke, Sharon Still Responsive, Son Says
